Kernels
================================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

This is the doc page for our kernels/forks developed at Anyhelper.

====
Identifying Clusters of Related Visa Questions [LSA]
====

This is our first actively mantained kernel, built with a R&D fashion from a fork of a StackOverFlow-questions dataset.
The idea is to follow the same data-processing workflow of `this kernel <https://questions-clustering.readthedocs.io/en/latest/kaggle/datasets/Python_Questions_from_Stack_Overflow.html>`_ and apply it to our dataset.

This is the `Kaggle repository for the kernel <https://www.kaggle.com/alessandrosolbiati/identifying-clusters-of-related-visa-questions>`_.
